desc.en:
Originally this elite arm of the Myzan army was setup by the Osguard family to act as the royal guard. When the Society came to power it was disbanded and its members outlawed as traitors.

Recently word reached the highest surviving member of the organisation that could have dire consequences. An ancient directive written by the Osguards themselves has been activated and the Council of Truth must fight the might of the Tenth Legion to prevent them acquiring the Amulet of Destiny.
